title: 'How can we feel safe?': Uyghur on Chinese government policy
description: CNN's Ivan Watson speaks to several Uyghurs about a Chinese government policy that forces Uyghur families to host government officials in their homes.

title: Acosta remembers WH Christmas memory with Obamas' dog Bo
description: The Obamas announced that their beloved family dog Bo has died. CNN's Jim Acosta reports.

title: What a year of mourning taught America's florists about grief
description: After in-person funeral services were restricted during the pandemic, many sent flowers. From New York City to New Mexico, here's what America's florists have learned after a year of helping us say goodbye.
